group_1.textLeft: What is it, what is it?

group_1.textRight: Alright!
I've met some people while living in town.
Since I had some daidaikko from the last time I@visited the village,
I thought I'd let them try it.
So I gave it to them, and...

group_1.textLeft: What happened?

group_1.textRight: I wish you girls could've seen the looks on their faces.@They were shocked at how good it tasted.

group_1.textLeft: It's the Tokime Clan's pride and joy!

group_1.textRight: So my friends fell in love with daidaikko,
and one of them, who works at a supermarket,
wants to have an exhibition of the village's products,@especially our daidaikko.

group_1.textLeft: A product exhibition?
Now that you mention it, that's what the@supermarket was hosting today...
Does that mean we can sell the daidaikko at the@supermarket?!

group_1.textRight: Well, they'll let us use part of the store to sell them.
We'd still have to deliver the goods there,
so I wanted to see if I could round up some people@to help.
What do you think? You guys up for it?
Yes!@This is great, Mom!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, it's excellent timing.
So when will the exhibition be?

group_1.textRight: Tomorrow and the day after.
It's a bit last-minute, but...
There's no other room on their schedule except for@those two days.

group_1.textLeft: Please wait a second.
Does this mean we'd need to deliver the daidaikko...
...before the store opens tomorrow?

group_1.textRight: I know it'll be a bit of work, but...

group_1.textLeft: Hey,
about how long does it take to get from here to@the town?

group_1.textRight: Erm, well...
How should I put this...!

group_1.textLeft: It's a shame, but we'll have to cancel.

group_1.textRight: Aw, c'mon...
There's no point in letting the daidaikko go to waste!
We could use it to earn money for the village...

group_1.textLeft: We don't have any other choice.
We can't get the daidaikko to the town in time.

group_1.textRight: Can't we take care of it?

group_1.textLeft: Shizuka?

group_1.textRight: We'll carry it over.
I'll go over there to help with the exhibition as a@representative of the Tokime Clan.

group_1.textLeft: Are you certain about this?

group_1.textRight: If it's for our clan, then of course I'm certain.
And I'll also help sell our goods at the supermarket.
It's a surefire way of getting used to the city,@don't you think?

group_1.textLeft: That's...true...

group_1.textRight: What do you think, you guys?

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah, let's do it!
...Very well, if you two want to, then...

group_1.textRight: All right, then, Mrs. Hiroe,
the three of us will be helping with the product@exhibition.

group_1.textLeft: You're just middle schoolers; we can't let you go@on your own...

group_1.textRight: Shizuka's right, though! We need to do this for the@sake of the Tokime!

group_1.textLeft: ...You're right.
You're very strong Diviners.
So if you're going to do this for the village, then@I have to support you.
But I'll need permission from your parents and the@supermarket.

group_1.textRight: Thank you very much!
Um...
I'll be the one to ask my parents, if that's alright@with you.

group_1.textLeft: But...

group_1.textRight: It'll be okay.

group_1.textLeft: ...Alright.
Well, you three should get ready for tomorrow, then.
